frilly skirt.description: A cute skirt with frills on it!
frilly skirt.adorntxt: You slip on the frilly skirt. You look totally adorable in this! You twirl in place watching the frills go crazy.

tuxedo.description: A formal black and white suit.
tuxedo.adorntxt: You pull on your professional suit. You look very spiffy!

small top hat.description: A tiny top hat that rests askew on your head.
small top hat.adorntxt: You plop the top hat on your head. It slides to an angle.

giant red bow.description: A huge red bow worn on the back or side of the head. Its tails trail and flow in the wind
giant red bow.adorntxt: you tie the bow into your hair.

rain boots.description: Large partially see through rain boots that almost come up to your knees. Protects you from splashing in big puddles.
rain boots.adorntxt: You pull on your big rubber rain boots! They are cozy and will keep your feet warm.

baggy hoodie.description: A big soft hoodie with a large front pocket. On the front is a character from your favorite show!
baggy hoodie.adorntxt: You pull the massive hoodie over your head, snug inside of it, you are ready to face the world!

rose poncho.description: The ponchoiest poncho EVER. It is pink and in the shape of a huge rose! It smells like roses too. This will keep you safe from the wind.
rose poncho.adorntxt: You pull on the poncho, the smell of roses filling your nostrils as you do.

swimsuit.description: A cute little swimsuit for splashing in the water!
swimsuit.adorntxt: You dip into a changing room and emerge wearing your cute swimsuit!

jeans.description: A pair of jeans with a flower pattern on the back!
jeans.adorntxt: You pull on your jeans, one leg at a time.

long skirt.description: A long skirt, with a beautiful pattern.
long skirt.adorntxt: You slip on the long skirt. You feel sophisticated and beautiful.

short shorts.description: A pair of short shorts. Some people think these are innapropriate, YOU think they're cozy AF.
short shorts.adorntxt: You pull with all your might to get your short shorts on.

sundress.description: A beautiful sundress with flowers on it!

striped shirt.description: A striped loose fitting top for hot days!
striped shirt.adorntxt: You pull on the striped shirt.
